csw:Record.dc:title: Black Sea Biogeochemistry Reanalysis
csw:Record.dct:abstract:
'''Short description:'''
The biogeochemical reanalysis for the Black Sea is produced by the MAST/ULiege Production Unit by means of the BAMHBI biogeochemical model. The workflow runs on the CECI hpc infrastructure (Wallonia, Belgium).
Please refer to our Technical FAQ for citing products.http://marine.copernicus.eu/faq/cite-cmems-products-cmems-credit/?idpage=169
'''DOI (product) :''' https://doi.org/10.25423/CMCC/BLKSEA_REANALYSIS_BIO_007_005_BAMHBI
